content: Genius Voucher is a platform that helps NGOs manage and control voucher-based humanitarian projects in real-time. With this platform, NGOs can easily track and report on their distribution activities, eliminating the need for manual data entry. The platform includes POS machines and smart cards for authorized vendors and beneficiaries, as well as a software portal for the project team to create and monitor their distribution projects. Genius Voucher is an all-in-one solution that provides the hardware and software needed to manage voucher-based humanitarian projects.
